Admin

Interface PurpleBoxAdminInterface


  • public interface PurpleBoxAdminInterface
    Implement to create a PurpleBox Administrator class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Fantastic4

    • Method Detail

      • addToInventory

        void addToInventory(Movie movie)
        Add new movie to Inventory.
        Parameters:
        movie - object of class Movie.
        Require:
        Movie item must be initialized and have all it's data members filled.
        Ensure:
        Movie is added to ArrayList inventory.

      • removeFromInventory

        Movie removeFromInventory(Movie movie)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Remove movie from Inventory.
        Parameters:
        movie - object of class Movie that should be removed from inventory.
        Returns:
        movie this movie object is returned.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Movie object does not exist.
        Require:
        Movie item must be initialized and must be in the ArrayList inventory.
        Ensure:
        Movie object is removed from inventory and erased.

      • changePrice

        double changePrice(double newPrice,
                   boolean type)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Set or change price of all movies of a specific type.
        Parameters:
        newPrice - double new price.
        type - boolean True - BluRay. False - DVD.
        Returns:
        double old price.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - invalid data type.
        Ensure:
        Price for all movies of specific type are changed.

      • addPromoCode

        void addPromoCode(java.lang.String newCode)
        Add new PromoCode.
        Parameters:
        newCode - String new promotional code added.
        Ensure:
        Promotional code is added to list.

      • enableUnit

        boolean enableUnit()
        Enable unit for use.
        Returns:
        boolean True - Unit Enabled. False - Unit Disabled.
        Ensure:
        Purple box unit is enabled.

      • disableUnit

        boolean disableUnit()
        Disable unit for use.
        Returns:
        boolean True - Unit Enabled. False - Unit Disabled.
        Ensure:
        Purple box unit is disabled.
